trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_SEQ_00<tab>Roger needs an extra hand to take orders.

TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Roger at the Coffer & Coffin.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_SEQ_02<tab>You have taken all the orders. Deliver the slips to Roger.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_SEQ_03<tab>Roger thanks you for attending to his more demanding customers, and promises to share profitable information with you.

TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Roger at the Coffer & Coffin.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Roger at the Coffer & Coffin.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_1<tab>Ye know, <var 08 E905 ((lassie)) ((laddie)) /var>, if yer just gonna stand around with yer thumb up yer arse, I can give ye somethin' to do.

TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_2<tab>Thanks to me unbelievably low prices, we've no shortage of customers here at the Coffer & Coffin. But by the same token, I can't afford to hire much help. We're chronically understaffed.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_3<tab>What's more, there's those lazy-arsed types what refuse to come an' order at the counter. It'd be a great help if ye could attend these customers for me.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_4<tab>Mark their orders on these here slips, then bring them here. Oh, and don't forget about ol' Adalfuns outside.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROUNDELPH_000_10<tab>Thal's balls, I'm spent! Grilled dodo, and a tankard of ale to wash it down!

TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROUNDELPH_000_11<tab>Gah, here I am again, spendin' what meager coin I've got at the Coffin... It ain't me fault, I tell ye! Ye'd do the same if yer wife served up shite every bleedin' day!

TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ADALFUNS_000_20<tab>Roger's new errand <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>, are you? Well then, I'll keep it simple for your sake: a tankard of your finest ale, chilled with an ice shard.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ADALFUNS_000_21<tab>Heh heh... There's nothing like a tall drink to help one forget about the trifling things in life─like work.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_SOLIDTRUNK_000_30<tab>The strongest brandewine you've got. I need help to forget...
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_RICARD_000_40<tab>Gods, I'm starving! Bring me ale, grilled dodo, and smoked shrew loaf! And make it quick!
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_RICARD_000_41<tab>Business is good─too good, even. I've nary got the time to take a piss, let alone eat. The mere thought of the Coffin's cooking makes my mouth water!
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_50<tab>That's all the orders, then?
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_51<tab>Let's see here... Ale, brandewine, grilled dodo...
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_52<tab>And for Adalfuns... Lemme guess─one tankard of ale. Right bleedin' miser, that one. I oughta put me boot up his arse.
TEXT_SUBWIL070_00324_ROGER_000_53<tab>Anyroad, ye did good, <var 08 E905 ((lassie)) ((laddie)) /var>. By way of thanks, I'm gonna tell ye somethin' what ought to prove to yer profit.
